queue_add.only_one_song: $username$, you can only request one song at a time! Cool down!
queue_add.success: $username$ just requested $songname$ and is added to the request queue #$id$

queue_remove.no_songs: No requests are in queue, can't delete $id$
queue_remove.success_granted: $username$'s song request "$songtitle$" granted. Next song is "$nextsongtitle$" from $nextsongusername$

specialraffle.start: A special raffle for $pointsname$ has been launched!, Type !join. $time$ seconds left!
specialraffle.no_one_joined: The special raffle has ended! No one joined the special raffle.
specialraffle.win: The special raffle is over and $pointsname$ has been reward to $winuser$! $winuser$ got $points$ $pointsname$!

core.connected: Bot is online and is awaiting to get commands.

chat.priosub: Subscribers are prioritized in queue now.
chat.unpriosub: Subscribers are no longer prioritized in queue now.
